HDG.CCP.content: thinking as commemoration (Andenken), akin to what is noble (Edlen) > night entices you to exult > exulting in waiting, become more waitful & more void > emptier, but richer in contingencies [risk, chance] > noble is what has origins [cf. Nietzsche’s On the Genea…] > noble abides in origins of its nature [habituate to your heart?]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: thinking as commemoration (Andenken), akin to what is noble (Edlen) > night entices you to exult > exulting in waiting, become more waitful & more void > emptier, but richer in contingencies [risk, chance] > noble is what has origins [cf. Nietzsche’s On the Genea…] > noble abides in origins of its nature [habituate to your heart?]

HDG.OHF.content: hermenutics: wakefulness (Wachsein) of Dasein for itself (not conventional understanding) > interpreting is a being, a distinctive how of character of being of facticity, that belongs to factical life itself (facticity not the object of hermeneutics) > chance that hermeneutics will go wrong belongs to its ownmost being

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
